tool.name: IMAGE
tool.description: Iterative Mapping and Assembly for Gap Elimination
tool.command:
mv $seqreads_fwd PE_1 && mv $seqreads_rev PE_2 && image.pl -scaffolds $fasta_input -all_iteration $all_iteration -prefix PE -iteration 1 -dir_prefix ite #if $sequencing.sequencing_type=="-velvet" -kmer $sequencing.kmer -vel_ins_len $sequencing.vel_ins_len #end if #if $advanced_options.options=="yes" -toignore $advanced_options.toignore -overhang $advanced_options.overhang
#end if

param.name: all_iteration
param.label: Number of iterations to be run:

param.name: sequencing_type
param.label: Which assembly tool should be used?

param.name: toignore
param.label: Exclude extension of less than n bases:

param.name: overhang
param.label: To not extend if overhang has > n bp:

tool.help:
**What it does**
IMAGE stands for Iterative Mapping and Assembly for Gap Elimination. It is a software designed to close gaps in any draft assembly using Illumina paired end reads.
**Output**
New FASTA file with (hopefully) closed gaps.
**Overview of the IMAGE process**
.. image:: http://www.genomebiology.com/content/figures/gb-2010-11-4-r41-1.jpg
-----
**IMAGE** is a Free and Open Source Software, see more details on the IMAGE_ Website.
.. _IMAGE: http://sourceforge.net/projects/image2/
